## RoutesConfigGroup interface

Used to generate [BaseRoute](./packer.baseroute.md) array.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface RoutesConfigGroup 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [base](./packer.routesconfiggroup.base.md) | \`/${string}/\` \| '/' | The generated path will prepend this field. |
|  [parent?](./packer.routesconfiggroup.parent.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The generated routes will be the children of the route whose [id](./packer.baseroute.id.md) is equal to this field. |
|  [patterns](./packer.routesconfiggroup.patterns.md) | string \| string\[\] | The patterns used by <code>fast-glob</code> to decide which file belonging to this routes. |
